Class CubieColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • CubieColor

  • public class CubieColor
extends java.lang.Object
    Copyright 2017, Shoumyo Chakravorti, All rights reserved.

    Licensed under the MIT License.

    The CubieColor class defines the set of colors and their respective directions that can be held by an individual cubie.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Shoumyo Chakravorti
